Convert LaTeX to a png file

Source: R/plot.R
texToPng.Rd

Convert LaTeX to a png file

texToPng(
  tex,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  dpi = 72,
  viewPng = FALSE,
  fontsize = 12,
  calcM = FALSE,
  crop = FALSE
)

Arguments

tex

TeX string. Remember to escape backslash with \.
width

Width of the png.
height

Height of the png (width are ignored).
dpi

Dpi of the png. Not used if width or height are specified.
viewPng

View the result in the plots window.
fontsize

Front size used in the LaTeX document.
calcM

Estimate 1 em in pixels in the resulting png.
crop

Call pdfcrop.

Value

The filename of the png or a list if calcM = TRUE.

Examples

tex <- "$\\mathbb{R}_{\\geqq}$"
texToPng(tex, viewPng = TRUE)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa3693014bd.pdf": No such file or directory
texToPng(tex, fontsize = 20, viewPng = TRUE)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa353a1ba3e.pdf": No such file or directory
texToPng(tex, height = 50, fontsize = 10, viewPng = TRUE)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa31eca6757.pdf": No such file or directory
texToPng(tex, height = 50, fontsize = 50, viewPng = TRUE)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa37a46908b.pdf": No such file or directory
tex <- "MMM"
texToPng(tex, dpi=72, calcM = T)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa32ebbd464.pdf": No such file or directory
texToPng(tex, width = 100, calcM = T)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa32d750934.pdf": No such file or directory
f <- texToPng(tex, dpi=300)

#> Warning: error in running command
#> Error in normalizePath(pdf, mustWork = TRUE): path[1]="/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpKiC6JH/fileaa35eaf4c3c.pdf": No such file or directory
pngSize(f)

#> Error in pngSize(f): could not find function "pngSize"
